alert.note: Alert for Georgetown; Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 1:19PM EST until December 17 at 2:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 215 PM EST. * At 119 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Forestbrook, or over Socastee, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Little River, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Murrells Inlet, Cherry Grove Inlet, Little River Entrance, Loris, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, and Adrian. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
